import { Component, Input } from "@angular/core" import { IReply } from "../replies/reply" @Component({ selector: "app-question-reply-card-component", templateUrl: "./questionReplyCard.component.html", }) export class QuestionReplyCardComponent { @Input() reply!: IReply; }
